On 14 November, an interview with journalist Piers Morgan was published. In the interview, Ronaldo said he felt "betrayed" by ten Hag and a few others who wanted him to leave the club. Ronaldo also said the club "doubted" him when he said he could not attend pre-season training due to his daughter's illness. Additionally, Ronaldo expressed that he does not respect ten Hag "because he doesn't show respect for me". This led him to be disappointed with the communication of the club.
